"Darts. There isn't a single other non-contact sport that can match the arrows for physicality."
It's been a profound Tuesday morning.
Jelle Klaasen back in the Premier League!
That's title number 26 this season for Michael van Gerwen. Not too shabby I suppose. He'd do alright in his annual review... #lovethedarts
This is ridiculous. MVG is from another planet. Even when he's having a touch of double trouble he's still thumping Anderson #lovethedarts
#PrayForGaryAnderson
God, this is a fucking belter. Any chance the PDC can make it best of 21 sets so we can enjoy it all night please? #lovethedarts
Breathtaking opening set. Six 180s & a 122 c/o. Anderson averaging 112 but Van Gerwen holds throw to take it. Brilliant stuff #lovethedarts
Here we go! #lovethedarts
@petejstarr You're bloody insane pal. I respect that ✊
@petejstarr Controversial tweet alert. Risky business for a Monday petal.
Received The Perfect Bet (@AdamJKucharski) for Christmas. Can't put it down. Would recommend it to anyone in the in… https://t.co/08MNwVsr8f
Massive three darts. Anderson can only hit 25 looking for a bull finish on 124. Wright steps up and hits T20 D15 to take 90 and the set 🎯
A serious bout of double trouble for Peter Wright. Not an ideal time to come down with a dose of it... #lovethedarts
Thoroughly enjoyed #ITVracing today. @chamberlinsport was superb. It might not satisfy die-hard racing nuts, but that's what RUK is for 🐎
@p_w_l And to you Philbird 💞 will hopefully be over early in the year xx
Finished the year with a few pints and some scampi and chips with this little trouble maker… https://t.co/6axM2XfAWw
While the previous three quarter-finals were brilliant, this is a war of attrition. Barney up 4-2 but he looks shattered #lovethedarts
Some dodgy doubling tonight. Barney and Taylor have missed 20 each now. #lovethedarts
Delightful 1 D1 checkout from Barney. My personal favourite finish. A regular outshot of mine. #lovethedarts
@bootifulgame True. It's mad though. 5 out of 15 attempts he's taken out either 161, 164, 167 or 170. That blows my… https://t.co/JTSTEbgCBA

Take this in again.
This tournament Van Gerwen is hitting 161, 164, 167 and 170 checkouts 15 TIMES BETTER THAN ANY… https://t.co/fVbS0hXmGK
Two 170 checkouts for Michael van Gerwen! Nobody has worked the crowd this well since 'The Godfather of Soul' James Brown #lovethedarts
The quality of this darts match is just off the scale. Unreal from both Anderson and Chizzy #lovethedarts
Oh yes Chizzy. This is fucking brilliant. 21 180s in four sets and both men averaging over 106. Darts from another… https://t.co/TgQSKW5u6v
Poor ol' Chizzy. 107.17 average, eight 180s, 44% on the doubles and he's still 2-0 down... #lovethedarts
Super from Peter Wright - won 8 of 20 legs in 12 darts or less. Gutted for Wade. Still the greatest darts player never to win a world title
@ShaunCronin7 Easy money
Feel a little sorry for Webster here. MVG is just another level. 170 c/o, 4 180s, 12 140s+, 106 average. Just different class #lovethedarts
This is fantastic. MVG is 2-0 up but Webster is playing out of his skin. Could so easily have taken one of those sets. Brilliant match 🎯
Phil Taylor losing the rag at Mardle 😂 The Power accusing Mardle of 'dropping him in the shit' after bringing up Kevin Painter's antics!
Oh my. The Power is chucking some lovely arrers #lovethedarts
I'd pay the entrance fee alone to witness a #DiamondDab live #lovethedarts
Gurney walking off stage without applauding the crowd. Booed off. Looking forward to the reception he gets in the 1/4 final! #lovethedarts
Daryl Gurney having a World Championship meltdown. Not only is he missing doubles but he's pissed off many nuns, smurfs & a honey monster...
Barney couldn't hit D16 for toffee earlier and now in the final set, when the pressure is really on, he pings 2 from 2 attempts #BarneyArmy
This is an absolute belter. Hon Barney!
@Wayne501Mardle Tactics or antics? 😉
@WexfordKris True - Might not matter if he can sneak this set. Hopefully settles him down.
What a match. Van de Pas had four c/o 112+ to fight back after Anderson averaged 115+ in the opening thee sets and didn't miss a double 😮
This. 😮 https://t.co/ld8bBVpZMS
Gary Anderson is averaging 114 and has hit 6/6 doubles. Absolute scenes. 🔥🔥🔥
Good lord. That opening set between Gary Anderson and Benito van de Pas was breathtaking. Best set of the tournament easily #lovethedarts
So many flame emojis for Peter Wright's finishing there. 12 from 16 I think it was in the end. Remarkable stuff 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 #lovethedarts
